:::The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::

::The repairs were finally complete, and all of my Destrons look at it in 
awe::
Falcon: I've never seen the Neocon base in such good condition!
Skywarp: Yep.
::Ramjet walks over to Cygnar::
Ramjet: Cygnar, ive been looking at maps of this planet, and we are in a 
strategic location.
::He brings up a holo map::
Ramjet: Our base is reasonably close to this base
::he points at the Blackfortress::
Ramjet: And extremely close to this one.
::he points to the Trainer base::
Ramjet: I need help deciding what should be done with these two groups-- 
destroy, or help. Since you are the strategic mind around here, i thought you 
might know.

--part1_9c.c920ab2.27e4de0b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
